rows.label: qst701510_msg0001
rows.name: Hmph. So you're ill.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0002
rows.name:
And you still came all the way to
see me?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0003
rows.name: It's all thanks to these youngsters.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0004
rows.name:
You're not dead yet, so why not do
what you can while you're still alive?
That's what they said to me.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0005
rows.name:
I think I chose my words a little more
carefully.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0006
rows.name: Did you really? I couldn't tell...

rows.label: qst701510_msg0007
rows.name:
Everyone, I'd like to extend my
heartfelt thanks to you all.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0008
rows.name:
When you get as old as we are, you get
so tangled up in obligations, it feels as
if you can't move any more.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0009
rows.name:
You get used to glossing over difficult
things, or giving up entirely. But that
did no good at all...for either of us.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0010
rows.name:
It's true. We were both too wrapped
up in our own lives...

rows.label: qst701510_msg0011
rows.name:
How about it, Mirei? Why don't you
stay here tonight? We have years and
years of stories to swap.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0012
rows.name:
And I want your expert opinion on
where to display your vase.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0013
rows.name: Teo... Are you sure?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0014
rows.name:
*Sniff* Damn it. I've got something in
my eye...

rows.label: qst701510_msg0015
rows.name: Shall we leave these two alone?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0016
rows.name: Wait!

rows.label: qst701510_msg0017
rows.name:
Something's been nagging at me this
whole time. Haven't I seen you before
in Acedia?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0018
rows.name:
I have! I'm sure I have! With someone
called...Deacon Marveni? He helped
me when I slipped on some stairs!

rows.label: qst701510_msg0025
rows.name:
Weren't you his attendant? He was so
kind. How is he?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0020
rows.name:
Don't worry. Whatever their past deeds,
all souls will attain salvation. I believe
that with all my heart.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0021
rows.name: Here, take this.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0022
rows.name: What is it?

rows.label: qst701510_msg0023
rows.name:
It's only a little thing. I made it once
to ward off evil and invite happiness.
I don't need it any more now.

rows.label: qst701510_msg0024
rows.name:
May your path be blessed from this
day on.
